__e: You're into bugs and dinosaurs and not so into sports, so I'm thinking you're pretty smart, right?
It's a crazy hunch, but I want you to take my Bug and go and see if he was there.
You show him a beetle and he'll tell you what it's thinking.
I got that bug at 6 o'clock, and I'm moving in to swat that fly right now.
Who put these bugs on my arms?
